description: When the midweek rush is on, this easy, budget-friendly recipe for curried beef bowls is perfect. You'll only need 20 minutes to whip it up, and it's less than $5 per serve.
name: Curried Beef Bowls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g Prep Set Go frozen tri colour capsicum
450 g Woolworths microwave white long grain rice

recipeInstructions.text: Divide rice among bowls, top with curried beef and coriander, and serve with naan.
Divide rice among bowls, top with curried beef and coriander, and serve with naan.
